Colormap¶

Extra colormaps and tools to make even more matplotlib colormaps

cm¶

Colormap tools and additional colormaps from http://soliton.vm.bytemark.co.uk/pub/cpt-city/ in matplotlib format

Functions¶

cpt2python(cptfile) Convert GMT-stype CPT file to python colormap.
cpt2cmap(filename[, cmapname, lut, inverse])
